interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
Indicates the content is canonical, i.e., widely agreed upon. Abbreviations of work titles are primarily in view.

langUsage.p: Languages codes used in this record follow the Syriaca.org guidelines. Documentation available at: http://syriaca.org/documentation/langusage.xml

bibl.title: Titus (Peshitta version)
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܦܘܠܘܣ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܛܘܣ
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܛܘܣ
Titus
Titus
ܐܶܓܰܪܬܳܐ ܕܦܰܘܠܳܘܣ ܕܰܠܘܳܬ ܛܺܛܳܘܣ
ܫܠܡ̣ܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܛܘܣ ܕܗ̣ܘ ܩܕܡܝܐ ܗܘ̣ܐ ܐܦܣܩܦܐ ܕܥܕܬܐ ܕܩܪܛܐ. ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ݂ ܡܢ ܢܝܩܦܘܠܝܣ. ܒܝܕ ܐܪܛܡܐ ܬܠܡܝܕܗ. ܕܐܝܬ ܒܗ̇ ܦܬ̈ܓܡܐ ܡܐܐ ܘܐܪܒܥܝ̣ܢ ܘܬܫܥܐ .ܘ:ܘ.
The Epistle of Titus, according to the Peshitta version
ܫܠܡܬ. ܐܓܪܬܐ. ܕܠܘܬ܀ ܛܛܘܣ. ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ܀ ܡܢ. ܢܝܩܦܘܠܣ. ܘܗܘܝܐ. ܡܐܐ. ܘܬܫܬܥܣܪ. ܦܬ̈ܓܡܝܢ.
Titus, according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of Titus
ܐܓ݁ܪܬ݁ܐ ܕ݂ܠܘܬ݂ ܛܛܘܣ
ܐܶܓ݁ܰܪܬ݁ܳܐ ܕ݂ܰܠܘܳܬ݂ ܛܺܛܳܘܣ
The Epistle to Titus
bibl.note: Titus (Peshitta version) is extant as early as the 5th-6th century and consistently circulates as one of the Pauline Epistles (Peshitta version) .
ܦܿܘܠܘܣ ܥܒܼܕܿܗ ܕܿܐܠܗܐ܂ ܘܫܠܝܚܗ ܕܿܝܫܘܼܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ܂ ܒܿܗܝܡܢܘܼܬܼܐ ܕܿܓܼܒܼܝܐ̈ ܕܿܐܠܗܐ܂ ܘܝܕܼܥܬܼܐ ܕܿܫܪܪܐ ܕܿܒܼܕܼܚܠܬܼ ܐܠܗܐ܂
